note.p: Birth: Bath, Somerset, England, Europe (9 August 1629)

Career: Commissioner for Assessment for Anglesey (1647-1648, 1660-1680), Caernarvon (1660-1663, 1664-1680), Anglesey and Caernarvon (1689-1690); MP for Anglesey (1661); Sheriff of Anglesey (1661-1662); Deputy Lieutenant for Anglesey (1661-?1680, 1689-1712); Custos Rotulorum (1689-1690)
Other RSActivity: Commissioned by the Society to take some geological samples at Anglesey for further magnetic observations (1666).
Contributed funds for the building of a Society college (1669).
